announcements.headline: Lunch break fitness! TRX and Aerial Yoga
announcements.body:
Stay light for lunch and get in a workout or work up your appetite for flexibility and strength!
TRX - Mondays & Wednesdays 12:30 to 1:15 pm. $5/class
Aerial Yoga - Fridays 12:30 to 1:30.  $10/class
Contact Tracy or Stacy or message us on Facebook.

announcements.headline: Try any regularly scheduled martial arts class for free!
announcements.body: Just try to let the instructor know you're coming & show up a few minutes early. ðŸ˜‰ See the calendar link below for class schedules.
